name: rblem2
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: anmp(wo(wn(wo(w0, w1)), wo(w0, wo(w1, w2))), wo(wn(w1), wo(w1, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wo(wn(wo(w0, w1)), wo(w0, wo(w1, w2)))
-| wo(wn(w1), wo(w1, w2))
-| wo(wn(wo(wn(w1), wo(w1, w2))), wo(wn(wo(w0, w1)), wo(w0, wo(w1, w2))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wo(wn(wo(w0, w1)), wo(w0, wo(w1, w2)))
-| wo(wn(w1), wo(w1, w2))
-| wo(wn(wo(wn(w1), wo(w1, w2))), wo(wn(wo(w0, w1)), wo(w0, wo(w1, w2))))

body.origin:
|- wo(wn(w1), wo(w1, w2))
-| wo(wn(wo(w2, w1)), wo(w1, w2))
-| wo(wn(w1), wo(w2, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wo(wn(wo(w0, w1)), wo(w0, wo(w1, w2)))
-| wo(wn(wo(wn(w1), wo(w1, w2))), wo(wn(wo(w0, w1)), wo(w0, wo(w1, w2))))
-| wo(wn(wo(w2, w1)), wo(w1, w2))
-| wo(wn(w1), wo(w2, w1))

|- wo(wn(wo(w0, w1)), wo(w0, wo(w1, w2)))
-| wo(wn(wo(wn(w1), wo(w1, w2))), wo(wn(wo(w0, w1)), wo(w0, wo(w1, w2))))
-| wo(wn(w1), wo(w2, w1))

|- wo(wn(wo(w0, w1)), wo(w0, wo(w1, w2)))
-| wo(wn(wo(wn(w1), wo(w1, w2))), wo(wn(wo(w0, w1)), wo(w0, wo(w1, w2))))

body.origin: |- wo(wn(wo(wn(w1), wo(w1, w2))), wo(wn(wo(w0, w1)), wo(w0, wo(w1, w2))))

comment: Used to rederive the Lukasiewicz axioms from Russell-Bernays'. (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 18-Aug-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
